DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 4 open label , non-interventional , multi-center study evaluate safety Enbrel ( etanercept ) treatment patient receive etanercept 25mg sc twice weekly 50mg etanercept weekly . The improvement health-related quality life also evaluate .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Safety Etanercept Rheumatoid Arthritis , Ankylosing Spondylitis Psoriatic Arthritis
DOC.detailed_description: Patients already prescribe receive etanercept first time treatment Rheumatoid Arthritis , Ankylosing Spondylitis Psoriatic Arthritis accord Summary Product Characteristics ( SmPC ) . Patients recruit sequentially base eligibility criterion number limit assign site .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old time consent Satisfies 1987 ACR Revised Criteria Rheumatoid Arthritis diagnosis ankylose spondylitis psoriatic arthritis , determine doctor Provides inform consent Demonstrate negative serum urine pregnancy test prior administration etanercept . Sexually active woman participate study must use medically acceptable form contraception . Patients already prescribe etanercept accord approve labelling Has hypersensitivity etanercept Has sepsis risk sepsis . Treatment etanercept initiated patient active infection ( ie . hepatitis C , hepatitis B , active TBC ) Is pregnant breastfeeding Has significant concurrent medical disease include , uncompensated congestive heart failure , myocardial infarction within 12 month , unstable angina pectoris , history human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection , immunodeficiency syndrome , central nervous system ( CNS ) demyelinate event suggestive multiple sclerosis Has history confirm blood dyscrasia Received live ( attenuate ) vaccine within 4 week screen visit
